document_data.name: River Gundar
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Gundar''' (alternatively the '''River Gundan''') was a waterway found in [[Estagund]] in the [[Shining Lands]].
document_data.Geography: The River Gundar originated in the [[Thrulaliel Mountains]] in northwest Estagund. It flowed southeast for approximately {{SI|200|mi|long=yes}}, practically bisecting the country in a diagonal line, before reaching the vast expanse of the [[Great Sea]] southeast of the [[Gundar Forest]].
